summary: Provides a command‑line driven utility that loads the UltraFeedback dataset, transforms it into an unpaired preference format suitable for reward model training, and optionally uploads the processed dataset to the Hugging Face Hub. Configuration options include selecting the target language model, specifying the evaluation aspect, controlling parallel processing, and toggling publishing.
business_intent: Facilitates the creation and distribution of preference data for reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) workflows, helping AI developers fine‑tune and evaluate language models more efficiently.
